review: I suffered an aortic dissection in October 2021.  It is controlled by keeping my bp and heart rate low.  Nothing has worked,  beta blockers made my heart race and caused severe GERD.  Amlodipine gave me palpitations,  lisinopril made me cough, HCTZ caused severe dizziness and high heart rate.   I started on losartan 50 mg then increased to 100mg.  It has been the only BP med I’ve been able to tolerate.  No side effects at all.   I’ve been on it 3 months.   My BP is better, not quite where it should be yet, but much better.
